alert.note: Alert for Anderson; Leon (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 03 at 1:59AM CST by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Leon and south central Anderson Counties through 300 AM CST... At 158 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles west of Centerville, or 24 miles northwest of Madisonville, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Buffalo, Elkhart, Centerville, Fort Boggy State Park, Lake Limestone, Corinth, Jewett, Hilltop Lakes, Redland, Normangee, Oakwood, Marquez, Leona, Pleasant Springs, Cedar Creek, Flo, Robbins, Eunice, Redtown and Centerview. This includes Interstate 45 between mile markers 152 and 180. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
